p: Skandamis and Nychas reported that oregano essential oil delayed microbial growth and suppressed the final counts of the spoilage microorganisms. Oregano essential oil delayed glucose and lactate consumption aerobically as well as under atmosphere consisted from: 40% CO 2/ 30% N 2/ 30% O 2; or CO 2 [ 111]. Mejlhom and Dalgaard reported the antimicrobial effect of essential oils on the seafood spoilage microorganism Photobacterium phosphoreum in liquid media and fish products [ 112].
